name: These Violent Delights
description:
These Violent Delights is a game about corporations, hackers, righteous crime and typing REALLY fast. It is a 1v1 networked game wherein the player playing the corporation has 2 physical keyboards and the player playing the hacker has 4 physical keyboards and they go head-to-head. The hacker is trying to progress each server breach to 100% by "hacking" as fast as they can while the corporation is attempting to hold this off until the safety measures by counter-"hacking" the same servers the hacker is attacking. 

All artwork was done by Amanda Hudgins @barelyconcealed http://amandathrows.rocks

*This alt-game does actually require 6 keyboards and 2 computers in order to play and is mainly uploaded for posterity. If you're brave enough to try a home setup, there are installation instructions attached below.
